column4: somebody knows a tool to recover files from a half-broken harddisk ?
define half broken hard drive
bad blocks, some unreadable files. It didn't spin up anymore, had to open it. Now it gets seen by pc, but want to recover some files on it, not all
open as in you physically opened the drive?
yes
yeah you need a professional recovery service now
surely not, it shows the disk in ubuntu :) its mounted, and can see files, just want a programm that tries a bit harder to copy everything, instead on giving up after 1 read retry
well, in that case dd is as low as you can go
but with dd I can't copy files ? just the full parition ?
err yeah
dump the disk, then try to recover?
dunno then :/
k :) thx anyway :)
sensors-applet
it can use hddtemp and lm-sensors as input
how do I add the applet ? can't find it directly
gotta install it fist
thats done :)
gpanel may need to be reloaded for it to see it so you can add it
killall gpnanel , should come back on its own
also ood :)
